metadata.title: CVE-2017-6886 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An error within the "parse_tiff_ifd()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp)in LibRaw versions before 0.18.2 can be exploited to corrupt memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6886` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.1
libraw15 - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.1-1ubuntu0.1').
ufraw package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
dcraw package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
